Awesome Blog

Kramdown Syntax

The kramdown syntax is based on the Markdown syntax.

Header

# Header 1
## Header 2
### Header 3
#### Header 4

Formatted Text

This is a italic text.

*italic*

This is a bold text.

**bold**

This is a italic bold text.

***italic bold***

This is a ‘I dont know’.

Ordered List

 1. A
 2. B
 3. C

Bullet List

  * 1
  * 2
  * 3

Quotes

This is a text in quote mode.

> This is a text in quote mode.
For more information Diego S.C.
